name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT TextCheck - analyze any text for Influence & Propaganda with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension to help you avoid misinformation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our mission is evolving, and so is our approach to ensuring your online experience is both enriching and truthful. By introducing ChatGPT-powered tools to detect propaganda, we empower you not only to dodge misinformation but also to become adept at recognizing propaganda techniques on your own. It's all about making informed choices while safeguarding your privacy.

Learn to Spot Propaganda Techniques: Our latest feature isn't just about filtering out noise; it's a learning tool. As our AI identifies potential propaganda, it also educates you on the 52 techniques used to spread misinformation. This knowledge allows you to independently discern and evaluate content, enhancing your critical thinking skills.

Privacy-First Policy: We stick to our commitment to your privacy. Our system operates securely without tapping into your personal information. It functions offline, comparing visited sites against a downloaded database of known sources, keeping your browsing habits confidential.

Empowered Decision-Making: When our system flags something suspicious, you're immediately informed but never restricted. The choice to read on, investigate further, or skip the content altogether remains entirely in your hands. You're also free to tailor your list of trusted sources to suit your preferences.
 
**Join "Better World 24":** By aligning with us, you're not just opting for a smarter way to browse. You're joining a community dedicated to cultivating a digital landscape where truth is accessible, and productivity flourishes. With the power of AI and a newfound understanding of propaganda techniques, you're equipped to thrive in an era of information overload.
